text: The Mole-Dagomba are a meta-ethnicity and western Oti-Volta Gur ethno- linguistic group residing in six present-day West Africa countries namely: Benin, Burkina Faso, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Mali and Togo. ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Benin Category:Dagbon Category:Ethnic groups in Burkina Faso Category:Ethnic groups in Ghana Category:Ethnic groups in Ivory Coast Category:Ethnic groups in Mali Category:Ethnic groups in Togo
title: Mole-Dagbon people
